ai.summary: Fox Fort Trail is a short, easy 3.5 km hike in the UK suitable for beginners and families. The route follows well-marked paths with a gentle profile, offering pleasant views and a quiet outdoor experience without steep ascents.
ai.terrain_summary: Terrain is mostly gentle and well-maintained, with a mix of grassy trails, compact gravel, and occasional roots or small steps. Expect smooth surfaces on most of the route, with only minor elevation changes.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for current conditions: check weather, daylight hours, and any path closures. Stay on marked trails, watch for other hikers and cyclists on shared sections, and carry a charged phone. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a waterproof layer, extra clothing, water, and a small first-aid kit. Let someone know your plan and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or lightweight hiking boots
Hat and sunscreen for sun protection
Map or offline navigation on your phone
Phone with emergency contacts and GPS
ai.best_seasons: Late spring to early autumn (roughly May–September) is ideal for pleasant weather and longer daylight. The trail can be enjoyed in milder winter weather with proper clothing and precautions.

seo.title: Fox Fort Trail – Easy 3.5 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Fox Fort Trail, an easy 3.5 km hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and gear for a comfortable outdoor walk.
